actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Historic Preservation Act of 1966 to permit the Secretary of the Interior to make certain grants in excess of the 50 per centum limitation contained in such Act.

summary.text: Amends the National Historic Preservation Act of 1966 to permit the Secretary of the Interior to make certain grants in excess of the 50 percent limitation contained in such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Historic Preservation Act of 1966 to permit the Secretary of the Interior to make certain grants in excess of the 50 per centum limitation contained in such Act.
